#summary How to attach images to wiki pages.

= It's quite simple:) =
You should do theese easy steps:
 # clone the wiki repository
{{{
git clone https://code.google.com/p/galaxy-expansion.wiki/
}}}
 # store your image in img folder
 # attach image to wiki
{{{
[http://wiki.galaxy-expansion.googlecode.com/git/img/your_image.png]
}}}
